articles.title: Amazon's Crucible launched with some pretty essential features missing - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: New online games rarely launch without a bunch of problems at the start, though the team-based shooter Crucible has somehow launched with no voice chat.
articles.content: Let’s talk about Crucible‘s launch. Amazon’s hero shooter landed on Steam earlier this week, and honestly? It was a bit of a mess. In fairness, a lot of brand new online games face similar issues to … [+2524 chars]
